name: Do you like toast?
description:
This is toast. One side is straight-forward and earnest, optimistic.

The other side is sarcastic and serious, almost pessimistic. 

I like to draw this character and leave it places. Usually on sticky notes or the like. This is my first Bitsy game and I loved making it, but it's very rudimentary. It's a maze! It has an end. 

Enjoy!
